about_the_game:
Designed for Oculus Meta Quest 2 PC-VR, Tracking Mode.

Cowboys and Zombies... What can go wrong?

Prove that you are the fastest gunslinger in the old west by literally shooting with your bare hands. You have to be quick or the zombies will eat you...

content_descriptors.notes:
The game is a zombie shooter... 
There are blood splatter shots, red blood. There are beatings and shooting at the zombies. The zombies are killed by shots and blows, although the zombies were already dead...

detailed_description:
Designed for Oculus Meta Quest 2 PC-VR, Tracking Mode.

Cowboys and Zombies... What can go wrong?

Prove that you are the fastest gunslinger in the old west by literally shooting with your bare hands. You have to be quick or the zombies will eat you...
name: Cowboys & Zombies VR Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / AMD 580 8GB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 6GB / AMD RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
